TOKEN.description: Get bot token from @BotFather on TG

SQLALCHEMY_DATABASE_URI.description: Your postgres sql db, Leave this field empty if you don't have one.

OWNER_ID.description: Your user ID as an integer.

SUPPORT_CHAT.description: Your Telegram support group chat username where your users will go and bother you with shit But be like: MyGroupChatUsernameBlah. If this ever points to Altron Support than consider you made an enemy.

EVENT_LOGS.description: Event logs channel to note down important bot level events, recommend to make this public. ex: '-123456'

JOIN_LOGGER.description: A channel where bot will print who added it to what group, useful during debugging or spam handling.

DEV_USERS.description: ID of users who are Devs of your bot (can use /py etc.). If you are a noob and would come and bother Altron Support then keep the current ID's here at they are and add yours.

STRICT_GBAN.description: Enforce gbans across new groups as well as old groups. When a gbanned user talks, he will be banned.

ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable environment variables. Leave it as it is

No_LOAD.description: Dont load these modules cause they shit, space separation

BL_CHATS.description: List of chats you want blacklisted.

START_IMG.description: Telegraph link of the image which will be shown at start command.
